questions.question: A man invested x rupees for 5 years at a rate of 2.5% simple interest. If he received an interest of 125000 after 5 years, find the amount he invested.
A man invested x rupees for 7.5 years at a rate of 6.5% simple interest. If he received a total of 125000 after 5 years, find the amount he invested.
A man invested x rupees for 7 years at a rate of 8.8% simple interest. If the amount he received after 7 years was 404000 rupees, find the amount he invested.
A man invested x rupees for 11 years at a rate of 12.2% simple interest. If the amount he received after 11 years was 1826760 rupees, find the amount he invested.
A man invested x rupees for 10.5 years at a rate of 21.6% simple interest. If the amount he received after 10.5 years was 2127468 rupees, find the amount he invested.
A man invested x rupees for 7.7 years at a rate of 13.3% simple interest. If the amount he received after 7.7 years was 23,68,197 rupees, find the amount he invested.
A man invested x rupees for 8 years at a rate of 9% simple interest. If the amount he received after 8 years was 26,00,640 rupees, find the amount he invested.
A man invested x rupees for 17 years at a rate of 33% simple interest. If the amount he received after 17 years was 45,00,088 rupees, find the amount he invested.
A man invested x rupees for 23 years at a rate of 0.9% simple interest. If the amount he received after 23 years was 30,41,640 rupees, find the amount he invested.
A man invested x rupees for 19 years at a rate of 37% simple interest. If the amount he received after 19 years was 90,15,281 rupees, find the amount he invested.
A man invested x rupees for y years at 25% simple interest per annum. If the interest after 4y years is 8x, find the value of y.
A man invested 1,25,000 rupees at x% simple interest for 2.5 years. After 2.5 years the interest was 1.25 times the amount invested. Find the value of x.
A man invested 1200 rupees at 4% simple interest for x years. If after x years the interest was 1.5 times the amount invested, find the value of x.
A man invested x rupees for y years at 12% simple interest. If after y years, the interest earned is 2.4 times of the amount invested, find the value of y.
A man invested 12000 at a rate of x% simple interest that earns 600 rupees interest per annum. Find the interest on 35800 rupees for 2 years at the same interest percentage.
A man invested 15000 rupees at 0.6% simple interest for 11.25 years. The interest earned is what percentage of the amount invested.
A man invested 4560 rupees at 46% simple interest for x years. If the amount tripled itself in x years, find the value of x.
A man invested a sum of 80000 rupees for 21 years at x% simple interest. If the interest for 21 years is 375% of the amount invested, find the value of x.
A man invested a sum of x rupees for y months at a rate of 12% per month simple interest. Find the time in which the sum will triple itself.

A man invested 24% of his income at a rate of 0.05% simple interest of the amount he invested for 45 years. If the man earns 120000 rupees, find the interest after 45 years, as a percentage of the amount he invested.
A man invested x rupees for y years at a rate of 6.2% simple interest. If he received 1.32x rupees after y years, find the value of y.
A man invested x rupees for y years at a rate of 33% per annum simple interest. If he received 4.33x after y years, find the value of y.
A man invested x rupees for y years at a rate of 12% per annum simple interest. If he received 7.2x after y years, find the value of y.
A man invested x rupees for y years at a rate of 82% per annum simple interest. If he received 9.6x after y years, find the value of y.
A man invested x rupees for y years at a rate of 44% per annum simple interest. If he received 9.8x after y years, find the value of y.
A man invested x rupees for y years at a rate of 38% per annum simple interest. If he received 5.22x after y years, find the value of y.
A man invested x rupees for y years at a rate of 27% per annum simple interest. If he received 3.27x after y years, find the value of y.
A man invested x rupees for y years at a rate of 5.25% per annum simple interest. If he received 2.25x after y years, find the value of y.
A man invested x rupees for y years at a rate of 11.5% per annum simple interest. If he received 3.2x after y years, find the value of y.
A man invested x rupees for y years at a rate of 10% per annum simple interest. If he received 1.5x after y years, find the value of y.
A man invested x rupees for 5 years at a rate of r% simple interest. If the amount he received after 5 years is 2.5x, find the rate percentage.
A man invested x rupees for 5.4 years at a rate of r% simple interest. If the amount he received after 5.4 years is 1.25x, find the rate percentage.
A man invested x rupees for 1.5 years at a rate of r% simple interest. If the amount he received after 1.5 years is 1.95x, find the rate percentage.
A man invested x rupees for 7 years at a rate of r% simple interest. If the amount he received after 7 years is 10x, find the rate percentage.
A man invested x rupees for 4 years at a rate of r% simple interest. If the amount he received after 4 years is 5.25x, find the rate percentage.
A man invested x rupees for 3 years at a rate of r% simple interest. If the amount he received after 3 years is 1.27x, find the rate percentage.
A man invested x rupees for 10.5 years at a rate of r% simple interest. If the amount he received after 10.5 years is 7.25x, find the rate percentage.
A man invested x rupees for 6.5 years at a rate of r% simple interest. If the amount he received after 6.5 years is 5.65x, find the rate percentage.
A man invested x rupees for 25 years at a rate of r% simple interest. If the amount he received after 25 years is 8x, find the rate percentage.
A man invested x rupees for 12 years at a rate of r% simple interest. If the amount he received after 12 years is 5.8x, find the rate percentage.
एक व्यक्ति ने x रुपये 25 वर्षों के लिए r% साधारण ब्याज दर पर निवेश किए। यदि उसे 25 वर्षों के बाद 8x रुपये प्राप्त हुए, तो r% का मान क्या होगा?
एक व्यक्ति ने x रुपये 12 वर्षों के लिए r% साधारण ब्याज दर पर निवेश किए। यदि उसे 12 वर्षों के बाद 5.8x रुपये प्राप्त हुए, तो r% का मान क्या होगा?
